with.title: Replacements
with.description: Extra items to apply in place of %s and %{x}$s in the translation string. These items inherit from the base component in styling, such as text colour and italics

name.title: Entity selector whose score to show

value.title: A default when score not found
value.description: Will be converted to a string if needed

selector.title: An entity to mention
selector.description: If there are multiple, they will be comma seperated until the last value with an 'and'

keybind.title: The name of the keybind to show

extra.title: Additional items to add
extra.description: These items inherit from the base component in styling, such as text colour and italics

bold.title: Whether to have the text bold

italic.title: Whether to have the text in italics

underlined.title: Whether to have the text underlined

strikethrough.title: Whether to have the text strikethroughed

obfuscated.title: Whether to have the text obfuscated
obfuscated.description: This makes the text cycle through characters with the same width

insertion.title: Insertion text
insertion.description: When the player SHIFT-clicks on a section of text, what to add to their chat window

clickEvent.title: Action on click
clickEvent.description: Action to perform when this text is left clicked on

action.title: What to do
action.description: open_url opens the web address in value, run_command runs the command in value (use /trigger), change_page changes the book page, and suggest_command replaces the player's chat window

hoverEvent.description: What to show upon a hover
